p: The C. integerrima and C. salicifolia oils and polyols were characterized determining the fatty acid composition, the oxidizability value (Cox), acid value (AV), iodine value (IV), saponification number (SN), kinematic viscosity, peroxide value (PV), density, hydroxyl number, thermogravimetric analysis (TGA), Fourier transform infrared (FTIR), and 1H and 13C NMR spectroscopy. It is important to note that the fatty acid composition, peroxide value, and the oxidizability value were performed only for the studied oils, and the rest of the characterization techniques were done for the C. integerrima and C. salicifolia oils and polyols.
